'Blue' is the colour of the clear sky and the deep sea. See Webster's New
World Dictionary of the American Language, College Edition, 1962. See also Le
Petit LaRousse, 1997: "De la couleur du ciel sans nuages, de l'azur". On the optical spectrum, blue is located between violet and green. Merriam-
Webster.com online dictionary, "blue".
